mapper.insert: insert into tb_reply (content_seq, character_seq, reply_text, reply_created_date) values (#{contentSeq}, #{characterSeq}, #{replyText}, now())
mapper.select: select reply_seq as replySeq, character_seq as characterSeq, reply_text as replyText, reply_like as replyLike, reply_created_date as replyCreatedDate, reply_modified_date as replyModifiedDate, (select count(*) from tb_reply_like where reply_seq = tb_reply.reply_seq and character_seq = #{characterNow}) as replyIsLike, (select nickname from tb_character where character_seq = tb_reply.character_seq) as replyWriter, (select concat(file_path, file_name) from tb_file where relation_tb = 'tb_character' AND relation_seq = tb_reply.character_seq) AS writerProfile, from tb_reply where content_seq = #{contentSeq} and reply_is_active = 1
